TextLibrary.Text: Edmund of Elenia
You fought bravely, young Knight.
You fought bravely, young Knight.
You fought bravely, young Knight.
You fought bravely, young Knight.
I didn't realize that the bow was such a powerful weapon!
I didn't realize that the bow was such a powerful weapon!
I didn't realize that the bow was such a powerful weapon!
I didn't realize that the bow was such a powerful weapon!
When you complete your training, we hope you will return to learn more of its secrets.
When you complete your training, we hope you will return to learn more of its secrets.
When you complete your training, we hope you will return to learn more of its secrets.
When you complete your training, we hope you will return to learn more of its secrets.
Can you tell me more about the Elenian Order, Sir?
Can you tell me more about the Elenian Order, Sir?
Can you tell me more about the Elenian Order, Sir?
Can you tell me more about the Elenian Order, Sir?
The Elenian Knights are the masters of the bow. We protect the western borders of Agaria from invasion by the Selentine Empire. We move through the woods without a sound. The forest belongs to us.
The Elenian Knights are the masters of the bow. We protect the western borders of Agaria from invasion by the Selentine Empire. We move through the woods without a sound. The forest belongs to us.

Thank you. I will consider your offer.
Thank you. I will consider your offer.
Thank you. I will consider your offer.
Thank you. I will consider your offer.
